thread.section_title: Spain-holiday.com opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre Spain-holiday.com | www.spain-holiday.com
thread.title: suzanne reeves

author: suzanne reeves
title: suzanne reeves
text: I have been renting my four properties for the last 7 years and have seen many changes in the terms and conditions from the larger rental web sites. Many of them are practically impossible to contact and their commissions and service charges are constantly rising, while their customer services to the home owners are diminishing. This is definitely not the case with Spain-Holiday. They offer a fantastic client service and are always available to help solve any issues or problems that may occur. I receive a high percentage of my bookings from their site and I would not hesitate to recommend them. This is a company that genuinely cares. Thank you Spain-holiday
